title: Silver Mining Token  (SMT)
body:
![SMT](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/goldminingfarm/silver-mining/main/artifacts/banners/silver-ad-728-90-2.png)
SMT will going to be launched. We stated that from day 1, we are going to deploy 3 assets along with GMT. 

SMT schedule is now knocking at the door.

Details Specification of SMT
====================
Name : Silver Mining Token
Ticker: SMT
Blockchain: Ethereum
Type: ERC20, mint-able DS-Token
Eco-system: Will published details at [Ḿining Έstate](https://smt.mining.estate)
Initial Supply: 1000 SMT
Private Sale: 200 SMT  * Unsold private sell allocation will be merged with pool
Pool opening Price:  25% + Private selling Price [ If private allocation fully sold out ]
Private Sell discount: 25% from pool opening price.
Private funds use: 70% will be merged with initial pool deposit which will be locked minimum 90 days.
Team Allocation: 100 SMT [ 10% ]
Initial Pair: SMT-ETH
Reward Rate: 0.0005 SMT /Block, which ensure very limited flow in market will be added. Which approximately less than one token /day, so lifetime mining will not be a inflation issue.
Supported LP: SMT-ETH & GMT-ETH
# Deploy: 10:30 PM GMT+6:00
Selling start: 14:20 PM GMT+6:00
Min contribution: 1 ETH
Contact: Telegram
Group link: https://t.me/goldminingfarm
Direct: https://t.me/GoldManOZ
Last development proposal: https://signal.goldmining.farm/#/gmt/proposal/QmfK6UgJvBFiNUF4oo2z75YHuouqpz33jxa4iYia6qodfn

Vote: LAND/MOON
